resources.string: Please make sure all fields have been filled.
Please enter a longer user name.
Please enter a valid email address.
It\'s time to create your avatar.\nUse the settings on the top of the screen to\nmake your avatar look like you.
Login failed. Please make sure you are connected to the internet and that all your information is correct.

You can equip up to 6 weapons.
I have difficulty making eye contact with others.
I find it difficult mixing comfortably with the people I work with.
I tense up if I meet an acquaintance on the street.
I feel tense if I am alone with just one person.
I have difficulty talking with other people.
I find it difficult to disagree with another’s point of view.
I get nervous that people are staring at me as I walk down the street.
I worry about shaking or trembling when I’m watched by other people.
I would get tense if I had to sit facing other people on a bus or train.
I worry I might do something to attract the attention of other people.
When in an elevator, I am tense if people look at me.
I can feel conspicuous standing in a line.
(1/3) Fear of embarrassment causes me to avoid doing things or speaking to people.
(2/3) I avoid activities in which I am the center of attention.
(3/3) Being embarrassed or looking stupid are among my worst fears.

First off, THANK YOU for taking part in this study! Welcome to Hero Blade (working title). This is a location-based adventure game which will assess your levels of physical and social activity over the next week.
Before continuing, please answer this 5 question survey. In the survey are a few questions related to the study. You\'ll need to enter your APP CODE:
Great! The aim of this study is to explore the connection between mood, anxiety and physical activity through games. But mainly, it\'s a bit of fun. So enough jibber jabber, here we go. :)
Looking good! Now you\'re officially ready to start playing! But wait, you\'ll need an epic weapon before you head out into the world. I\'ve got just the thing!
Here, I found this tree branch, but you can have it. It\'s been placed in your inventory. This will help fend off the baddies. You\'ll gather more weapons along your journey.
Okay, now I\'m sure you\'re definitely ready. It\'s time to take a look at the MAP.
Behold, the Map screen! This shows you what\'s around you (obviously). Updates will happen as you travel, and markers will pop up here when you go to new places! You will pick up items as you walk.
You can double tap to zoom in, or rotate using two fingers. You can keep this screen open while you walk (stay observant), or open it when you visit a shop or place of interest.
There are bandits lurking around the map. You can battle these bandits when you are close, just make sure you have some weapons ready.
When you visit a village, you will be greeted by a villager who will heal you. You can buy and sell food and potions from them. Villagers will pay lots of cash for potions you craft.

Villagers can be slightly personal at times. Try talking to them to see what I mean. However, if you answer all 3 of their questions honestly, they\'ll actually tell you something about yourself. (plus you\'ll get a big 500XP boost if you answer all 3)
Each village will have different items available. They will buy your items, but they won\'t buy your swords. You\'ll also have to wait before visiting the same village again.
Blacksmiths will repair all your weapons when you visit. You can buy new weapons and sell weapons you don\'t want anymore.
They look tough, but blacksmiths will ask about your mood and how your day\'s going. "A happy customer is a good customer."
There are over 50 weapons in the game. Buying from blacksmiths and opening chests are the best ways to get more weapons.
Leveling up will grant you a free treasure chest! You can view your chests buy touching the chest icon from the map screen.
When you level up, your max health will be increased. This means you can take more damage in enemy battles.
You can view your level and XP from the map screen in the bottom right corner. Check the leaderboard to see how far others have leveled up.
Treasure chest require you to walk around before they will open. You don\'t need to keep the app open to record steps, they will be counted even when your phone is sleeping.
Look under the chest to see how far you need to travel for each chest. The rarer chests require more walking, but have much better rewards inside.
If you have more than 1 chest, they will both be unlocked as you walk. You will be notified when a chest is opened.
Battle time. When you attack, arrows will appear at the bottom of the screen. Press the left and right sides of the screen to copy the arrow sequence (from left to right).
Look at the weapon types being used in battle. Using the right type can give you an advantage over your enemy. You can change weapons using the menu and choosing a new weapon.
If your health bar is low, eat some food to restore your health. Crafted potions will heal you much more efficiently in battle. If things get too crazy, you can run away.
As you level up, you will unlock new potion recipes. The crafting screen is where you can see your unlocked recipes. You gain XP each time you craft a potion.
Potions require certain items before they can be created. Potions appear gray until you have the required ingredients.
Potions can be helpful in battle. You can also sell potions to villagers to earn extra cash. Villagers will pay a lot of money for potions you craft.
In difficult times it may help to speak to professionals when you need someone to talk to, who can assist you in coping with your current circumstances.
Your answers indicate that you may have symptoms of Social Anxiety Disorder.
Potions can be helpful in battle. You can also sell potions to villagers to earn extra cash. Villagers will pay a lot of money for potions you craft.
Talk to villagers for some easy XP.
Treasure chests will always contain swords and cash.
Crafting items gives you an advantage in battle.
Villages will restore all of your health. Blacksmiths will repair all your weapons.
Try exploring new areas and locations with some friends.
It\'s normal to feel anxious sometimes, talking to someone can really help in tough situations.
If you feel light-headed under anxious situations, try breathing in and out calmly and relaxing your muscles.
Don\'t let anxiety isolate you. Ask a friend if they want to go to the shop or see a movie.
Stay true to yourself, create a list and set goals for yourself.
Make a concrete plan to meet new people. It can be very scary at first, but if you don’t try, you reduce your chances of making friends or meeting someone special.
It\'s easy to focus too much on how we appear to others. When socializing, try to pay attention to what other people are doing or saying.
If you\'re experiencing anxiety right now, first try to relax with calm in-and-out breathing and relax your muscles. Once calm, try to take note of what event or thoughts triggered your anxiety.
Negative thinking is a main source of social anxiety, and we can often be too hard on ourselves. Don\'t let anxiety isolate you. Ask a friend if they want to go to the shop or see a movie.
If you feel like you have tried everything and need someone to talk to it can be helpful to speak with professionals who can assist you in coping with your current circumstances.
You are not prepared for battle.
You are too far away. Try walking closer.
Let\'s get started.\nWhat is your name?
Move in the real world to move your avatar.
You must be signed in to Google Play to view achievements.
You must be signed in to Google Play to view the leaderboard.
Hmm, couldn\'t sign you in to Google. That means you can\'t view achievements or leaderboard.
You don\'t have enough money to buy that.
Welcome to our village! Your health has been restored. (+%1$dXP)
You\'re a good listener, thanks for talking to me! (+%1$dXP)
We talked already, come back later.
All of the villages agree that talking with you has been very helpful. Thank you!
Welcome to my shop. Your weapons have been repaired. (+%1$dXP)
Use your swords wisely. Come back soon.
Your treasure chest has been unlocked!
Chests contain treasures which can be unlocked by walking certain distances.
